This page is the list of songs, you may play the music with press play button on each song title

This page is the online store to review the song, onc review song usually using their own player. if you like it you might buy it for your personal collection. \n\n Normally if you want to buy a song its need online payment either using credit card or other payment channel depend on their term and condition.
